title: vaLLi nAyakanE
sahitya:
vaLLi nAyakanE vA! vA!


anupallavi

  vAnaLAvum un pugazh vAridiyAm un karuNAi
varuvAi ena nambinEn mar0vAdezhil guhanE! 


caraNam    vandE en agham niraindE vAzhum vaghaitanai kandane enakkughandE puganriDuvAi
tandai nIyE tavap-pudalvanum nIyE enattuNindEn dayaiyuDanE enakkaruL tarave
